text: The following television stations in the United States brand as channel 8 (though neither using virtual channel 8 nor broadcasting on physical RF channel 8): * WBPN-LP in Binghamton, New York * WDAY-DT2 in Fargo, North Dakota * WTOK-DT3 in Meridian, Mississippi 08 branded
title: Channel 8 branded TV stations in the United States
